name: Dark Verse
description:
PLEASE NOTE: this game is unfinished and has a lot of bugs but kyle said to upload it anyway! (Also if using the web-gl build make it full screen otherwise it looks wrong lol)
This game is a top down shooter game where you have to fight off the aliens that are corrupting the solar system! Kill all the aliens to restore the light to the solar system. There are several levels to get through so get going!
controls:
WASD or arrow keys to move the player
Mouse click to shoot
ESC to pause the game
Made by Iappo and usenowgamer
